SELECT BOARD_ID AS boardNo, BOARD_CAT AS boardCat, BOARD_NAME AS boardName, MEM_ID AS memId, BOARD_DATE AS boardDate, BOARD_DESC AS content FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_ID, BOARD_CAT, BOARD_NAME, MEM_ID, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_DESC ) VALUES ( #{boardNo}, #{boardCat}, #{boardName}, #{memId}, SYSDATE, #{content} )
